person.persName: Leonidas Metcalfe (Nicholas County farmer and soldier)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Thatcher Metcalfe. Father of Henry Clay Metcalfe and Elizabeth Metcalfe. Married to Sarah Ellen Victor Metcalfe on February 8, 1853. Captain of 3rd Kentucky Infantry in the Mexican-American War. Farmer in 1850. Farmer in 1860. Colonel of the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) in Paris, Kentucky, in August 1862.
